meanings.sent1: The runniest soup spilled over the bowl.
meanings.sent2: Her nose was runniest when she had a cold.
meanings.sent3: The runniest paint made a colorful mess on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The runniest river flowed swiftly through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The runniest jelly wobbled on the plate.

meanings.sent1: This is the runniest milk I have ever tasted.
meanings.sent2: The runniest pancake batter made the fluffiest pancakes.
meanings.sent3: The runniest ice cream melted too quickly in the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her runniest joke had everyone laughing for hours.
meanings.sent5: The runniest mud splattered all over his shoes.

meanings.definition: Characterized by flowing or dripping easily.
meanings.sent1: The runniest faucet in the house needed fixing.
meanings.sent2: The runniest candle wax dripped onto the table.
meanings.sent3: The runniest honey oozed out of the jar.
meanings.sent4: Her runniest story kept everyone entertained for hours.
meanings.sent5: The runniest syrup coated the pancakes perfectly.
